item.description:
Join us to attend the folk festival at Lowell. We will meet at noon. We will attend some live performances, walk around the historic Lowell downtown to take pictures, attend the parade in the evening and may be stop by to grab a drink at Cobblestone.

It is a great event for both music lovers and photographers. There will be lots of performances and also a lot of opportunities to shoot some great pictures.

The festival is FREE

For more information visit: http://www.lowellfolk...


When:
July 24, 2010, Noon
Will meet in front of Cobblestone Restaurant (91 Dutton St, Lowell, MA 01852) at the intersection of Merrimack ST, Dutton St and Arcand Dr.
I could be reached at (617) 299-6099 in case anyone plans to meet us later in the day.



Direction:

By Car

From Route 495 (Exit 35C) or Route 3 (Exit 30A if traveling southbound, Exit 30B if traveling northbound) to the Lowell Connector to Gorham Street (Exit 5C). Follow information on this map to City Garages in Downtown Lowell.

Parking in all Garages is $15 all day during the festival.

By Public Transportation

Schedules are subject to Change, please consult these organizations before planning your trip.

LRTA Bus:
Lowell Regional Transit Authority
Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority

MBTA Train â€“ Lowell Line
MBTA Schedule (Web Site)
Monday - Friday Schedule in PDF format (from MBTA Web Site)
Weekend Schedule in PDF format (from MBTA Site)
